days.title: Day 1 Prayer
days.text:
In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Intro Prayer

O glorious St. Margaret of Cortona, you embraced a life of penance and poverty after you repented of your sins.
Jesus touched your heart and after imposing on yourself a rigorous life of fasting, Jesus talked and conversed with you, revealing to you His merciful heart that rejoices whenever a sinner returns to Him.
By many penances and fasts, you freed yourself from all temptations, including those of the flesh of which you were a victim for many years.
Listen then to our petitions in this novena (mention your request here).
May you bring our petitions to Jesus.
Amen.

Concluding Prayer

Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be
St Margaret of Cortona, pray for us!
